title: I Hate This Place
description: I Hate This Place is an isometric open world survival horror game set in an eerie, unpredictable world that’s messed up beyond belief. Playing as Elena, you’ll unwittingly unleash long-dormant forces that threaten to tear your whole world apart.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**I Hate This Place** is an **isometric open world survival horror** set in an eerie, unpredictable world that's twisted beyond comprehension. Playing as **Elena**, you awaken forces that threaten to **shatter everything you knew about reality**.

<!--image-->
![I Hate This Place-15zqa](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/05992670f02e4aafa193c5355e3370ef/i-hate-this-place-15zqa.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# A Surreal Nightmare
<!--text-->
Inspired by the **award-winning comic book series** created by Kyle Starks and Artyom Topilin, **I Hate This Place** plunges you deep into a **supernatural world** where the rules of reality come undone. 

**The playful meets the petrifying** in this strange corner of the universe - **everything here wants you dead.**

Whatever you do, avoid the **Horned Man** at all costs.

<!--image-->
![I Hate This Place-vxzv7](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/05992670f02e4aafa193c5355e3370ef/i-hate-this-place-vxzv7.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Survival Horror with Day & Night Cycles
<!--text-->
Safety is a rare commodity in **I Hate This Place**. Wild animals, mutated spiders, crazy cultists and deranged outlaws — they’re all just **dying to meet you.**

Combat rewards **ingenuity over brute force**. Often outmatched, you'll need to **manipulate your surroundings** to even the odds against formidable foes. 

**Preparation** is the name of the game. Resources are scarce, enemies dangerous and unpredictable. You’ll need to **craft tools** that can help you **survive the wilderness** long enough to reach **ranch house** before nightfall.

Because when **the night** rolls around - hell breaks loose.

<!--image-->
![I Hate This Place-140bg](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/05992670f02e4aafa193c5355e3370ef/i-hate-this-place-140bg.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Vibrant '80s-Inspired Comic Book Style
<!--text-->
**I Hate This Place** features **bold, vivid colors** and **unsettling environments**, all wrapped up in a gloriously **retro '80s aesthetic** with just **a hint of camp** to lighten the mood. 

Each location is lovingly crafted to tell its own disturbing story through **stylish visuals** that blur the line between **reality and nightmare.**

<!--image-->
![I Hate This Place-1ec31](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/05992670f02e4aafa193c5355e3370ef/i-hate-this-place-1ec31.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Mysteries Worth Uncovering
<!--text-->
They say dead men tell no tales. But in this accursed land, **every specter has a story**, waiting to be unearthed. 

**Solve individual hauntings** and you'll start to glimpse the horrifying reality lurking at the heart of **I Hate This Place.**  

But tread carefully - **some secrets are buried for good reason.**
